spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but there are distortions in the kitchen/utility wing. Several internal door thresholds are missing or represented as open voids rather than swing doors. Window placement on the perimeter is simplified.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent adherence to cutaway view and background constraints. No text or UI elements present. Minor structural reinterpretation in the lower utility/toilet area where wall partitions are slightly simplified compared to the complex original plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture scale and placement are largely accurate, including the dining set and living room configuration. The kitchen island is a slight reinterpretation of the U-shaped counter shown in the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints. Low-poly geometry, flat shading, no textures, and a correct isometric orthographic camera angle.

detected_errors.description: Missing specific internal door swing representations; thresholds are mostly open gaps.
Kitchen counter layout changed from U-shape/perimeter to an island configuration.
Minor simplification of the wall geometry in the bottom-right utility and bathroom cluster.
